mapper.select: SELECT m_id, to_char(m_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') m_date, m_category, m_etc , m_t_id FROM MENU WHERE m_date BETWEEN TO_CHAR(TRUNC(SYSDATE,'day')+1,'yyyymmdd') AND TO_CHAR(TRUNC(SYSDATE,'day')+5,'yyyymmdd') ORDER BY m_date,m_category
mapper.update: update menu set m_id = #{m_id:INTEGER}, m_date = #{m_date:VARCHAR}, m_category = #{m_category:VARCHAR}, m_etc = #{m_etc:VARCHAR}, where m_id = #{m_id:INTEGER}
